pattern.value: 我喜欢使用的应用程序
In case you don't want to read through the boring stuff, I treat the
如果你不想读这些无聊的东西，我会把
following sections as something like a personal library.
下面的部分就像个人图书馆一样。
Leading the company-wide effort to create high quality website designs for clients.
领导全公司努力为客户创建高质量的网站设计。
Working as a freelance designer, video editor and motion graphics artist.
作为一名自由设计师、视频编辑和动态图形艺术家。
Building an ecosystem around globalization with a team of 8.
与 8 人团队围绕全球化建立生态系统。
Building digital products for other companies, ranging from websites to full-stack applications.
为其他公司构建从网站到全栈应用程序的数字产品。
Born on the 11th of January, 2001 in
I was part of the first generation getting adults in the age of computers, mobile phones, and advanced technology.
我是电脑、手机和先进技术时代第一代成年人的一员。
years later, I have learned coding in addition, opening whole new possibilities for people and              companies I work with. The job title I love using for this unique              field is:
几年后，我还学习了编码，为我工作的人和公司开启了全新的可能性。我喜欢在这个独特领域使用的职位名称是：
Quickly I got used to working with computers and in 2013, I began making money on the Internet by selling my skills as a
我很快就习惯了使用计算机，并于 2013 年开始通过在互联网上出售我的技能来赚钱。

In my archive, you will find smaller creations, MVPs, ideas and
          results from hackathons. Feel free to look through if you are
          interested.
在我的档案中，您会发现较小的创作、MVP、黑客马拉松的想法和结果。如果您有兴趣，请随意查看。
Live in a city with > 1 mio. inhabitants
居住在人口> 1 mio 的城市。居民
找到了自己的创业公司
Something went wrong. :( I couldn't save your message.
出了些问题。 :( 我无法保存您的消息。
Got it. Now I just need an email from you.
知道了。现在我只需要你的一封电子邮件。
Thanks, I will reach out to you soon! :)
谢谢，我会尽快与您联系！ :)
Okay! And what I can do for you?
Every detail about my personal site, collected on one page.
有关我个人网站的所有详细信息都收集在一页上。
This is my personal feed. A place for collecting my memories, writings, and showcasing stuff.
这是我的个人动态。一个收集我的记忆、著作和展示东西的地方。

to switch light / darkmode, change
            your system settings!
要切换明暗模式，请更改系统设置！

For the internet presence of: floriankiem.com according to German §5
          of TMG
对于互联网上的存在：floriankiem.com 根据德国 TMG §5

The entire content of this portfolio website, including but not
          limited to text, graphics, images, logos, videos, and design elements,
          is intellectual property unless otherwise stated. It is protected by
          applicable copyright laws and international treaties. Unauthorized use
          or reproduction of the content on this website is only allowed for
          private use and otherwise strictly prohibited and may violate
          copyright laws.
除非另有说明，本投资组合网站的全部内容，包括但不限于文本、图形、图像、徽标、视频和设计元素，均为知识产权。它受适用的版权法和国际条约的保护。未经授权使用或复制本网站内容仅限私人使用，否则严格禁止，并可能违反版权法。

The internal content provided on this portfolio website is for general
          informational purposes only. While Florian endeavors to provide
          accurate and up-to-date information, it makes no representations or
          warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness,
          accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of the content. In
          no event shall Florian be liable for any loss or damage, including
          without limitation indirect or consequential loss or damage, or any
          loss or damage whatsoever arising from the use or reliance on the
          internal content of this website.
本投资组合网站上提供的内部内容仅供一般参考之用。虽然 Florian 努力提供准确和最新的信息，但它不对内容的完整性、准确性、可靠性、适用性或可用性做出任何形式的明示或暗示的陈述或保证。在任何情况下，Florian 均不对任何损失或损害负责，包括但不限于间接或后果性损失或损害，或因使用或依赖本网站内部内容而产生的任何损失或损害。
Did I timetravel to the roman empire?
我是不是穿越到了罗马帝国？
A designer and developer building digital products.
设计和开发数字产品的设计师。
请尝试使用另一个页面。
Heading off to work in my Berlin apartment
前往我的柏林公寓上班
A photo of a rainy day in Berlin
Having dinner at a Berlin restaurant with Anton, Nils and Linus
与安东、尼尔斯和莱纳斯在柏林餐厅共进晚餐
A cold night at a campsite together with Luis
与路易斯一起在露营地度过一个寒冷的夜晚
inlang Onsite - A painting spinning and creating a cool effect
inlang Onsite - 一幅旋转的画作，创造出很酷的效果
inlang Onsite - Standing outside with Felix, Nils, Niklas and Jannes
inlang 现场 - 与 Felix、Nils、Niklas 和 Jannes 一起站在外面

The following text isn't translated because the privacy text is
            important in english-speaking countries only.
以下文本未翻译，因为隐私文本仅在英语国家/地区很重要。
You encountered an error. Please try
again later or open an issue.

This is a special section for giving credit to special people I
              like talking to, working with and enjoying time together:
这是一个特殊的部分，旨在表彰我喜欢与之交谈、共事并享受共度时光的特殊人士：
Obviously I also want to mention the talented team at
显然我还想提到才华横溢的团队
My personal site is hosted on

, offering both solid and outlined icons resulting in flexible
              usage based on size and surroundings I used them in.
，提供实心和轮廓图标，从而根据我使用它们的大小和环境灵活使用。
I got inspired by the following sites from awesome people
我从以下网站中获得了来自优秀人士的启发
The mockups I've used are from the

Most of my photos where made from friends, colleagues or myself.
              Credits to
我的大部分照片都是由朋友、同事或我自己拍摄的。致谢
Find my open-source repository on GitHub.
在 GitHub 上找到我的开源存储库。

The tech stack I've used might seem more advanced than you'd
              probably expect. One goal I followed was to use unopinionated
              tooling which allowed me to build my site as flexible as possible.
我使用的技术堆栈可能看起来比您想象的更先进。我遵循的目标之一是使用不拘一格的工具，这使我能够尽可能灵活地构建我的网站。
or the typography on this website I've used
或者我在这个网站上使用过的排版

, which was made with the influence of the Inter typeface and
              Apple SF Pro.
，它是受到Inter字体和Apple SF Pro的影响而制作的。
Here are some of the elements I've build especially for this site:
以下是我专门为此网站构建的一些元素：

I'm currently working on a new project and and want to inform
              you first when it's ready. I therefore created this personal
              waitlist. I will never spam you and will only update you when I
              have something really useful to share.
我目前正在开发一个新项目，并希望在项目准备就绪时先通知您。因此，我创建了这个个人候补名单。我绝不会向您发送垃圾邮件，只有当我有真正有用的东西要分享时才会更新您。
加入我的个人候补名单
Things I have worked on in my career. Includes all employment, freelance, and study work.
我在职业生涯中做过的事情。包括所有就业、自由职业和学习工作。
